label: Sinai Syriac NF M 38, Undertext (Christian Palestinian Aramaic)

note.value: Fol. 8v, 8r, 5v, 5r is in the CPA undertext fol. 8r, 8v, 5r, 5v

The undertexts of 1 Corinthians and 2 Corinthians come from the same original manuscript; see fol. 20 of the Green Collection, CCR2. (1.) Green Collection, CCR2, fol. 21r: 1 Corinthians 1:6b-12a; Green Collection, CCR2, fol. 21v: 1 Corinthians 1:12b-17; (2.)
